|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad2ax = 1148 |nqam2 = |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== A third 1x1:1 radio provides "2.4GHz/5GHz Scanning (only RX)" presumably :for future [[Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS)|DFS]] support. {{FCC ST|03/04/2019|indexme.}}
